translation: Ah, {#Name="セント"}
source: あちゃー{#Name="セント"}

translation: I finally caught a dragon, but... {#Name="セント"}
source: せっかく竜種を捕獲したのにぃぃいぃ{#Name="セント"}

translation: It seems like people who can see the big picture like me are rare, aren't they? {#Name="セント"}
source: やっぱり私みたいに大局的にモノゴトを見られる人達ばっかりじゃないかぁあぁ{#Name="セント"}

translation: I think it's better to not expect too much from others and just do what I can do myself {#Name="セント"}
source: どうしても自分が出来る程度の事は人に期待しちゃうんだよなぁあぁあ{#Name="セント"}

translation: Rather, I think there are fewer people at my level, don't you? {#Name="セント"}
source: むしろ私レベルの人は逆に少ないと思った方がいいんだろうなあぁあぁ{#Name="セント"}

translation: Expecting too much is a bad habit, isn't it? {#Name="セント"}
source: 期待しすぎちゃうのは良くない癖だなぁあぁあぁ{#Name="セント"}

translation: Is something bothering you? {#Name="ディト"}
source: なんかムカツクんですけどぉ？{#Name="ディト"}

translation: You're a apostle, aren't you, Tou? {#Name="ゼロ"}
source: トウの、使徒だな{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: …… {#Name="セント"}
source: ……{#Name="セント"}

translation: Want to die? {#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 死んでもらおうか？{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: And now... {#Name="セント"}
source: これで……{#Name="セント"}

translation: The situation has gotten worse {#Name="セント"}
source: 状況が悪化した{#Name="セント"}

translation: You fools don't even understand that, do you? {#Name="セント"}
source: そんな事も判らない、バカ共が{#Name="セント"}

translation: Is this what they mean by "unenlightened masses"? {#Name="セント"}
source: 縁なき衆生とは……この事か{#Name="セント"}

translation: What are you saying...? {#Name="デカート"}
source: 何を言って……{#Name="デカート"}

translation: Zero {#Name="セント"}
source: ゼロ{#Name="セント"}

translation: One day, that dragon will bring disaster upon you {#Name="セント"}
source: いつか、その竜が貴様に災いをもたらすぞ{#Name="セント"}

translation: Don't regret it later... Traitor's song... {#Name="セント"}
source: そうなってから後悔するなよ……裏切りのウタウタイ……{#Name="セント"}

translation: Zero! {#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ゼロッ！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: It's just the right time for a nap! {#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 昼寝には丁度いい時間だな！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: No way! I'm caught! I'm caught! {#Name="ミハイル"}
source: 違うよ！つかまってるんだよ！つかまってるんだよ！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: I know, I know {#Name="ゼロ"}
source: わかってるさ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Zero! Help! {#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ゼロ～！助けて～！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: Ah... {#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ああ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Damn... It's a golem {#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ちっ……ゴーレムか{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Here comes trouble! {#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Here comes trouble!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: The personification of evil is here! {#Name="Soldier B"}
source: The personification of evil is here!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Grant us strength! {#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Grant us strength!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Zero? Already!? {#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Zero? Already!?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Stay sharp or you're dead! {#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Stay sharp or you're dead!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Inform the first squadron she's arrived! {#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Inform the first squadron she's arrived!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: She, sir? {#Name="Soldier E"}
source: She, sir?{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Zero! A flor escura da morte!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Zero! The dark blossom of death!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: GYAAAH!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: GYAAAH!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Calm down! É apenas um ferimento superficial!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Calm down! It's just a flesh wound!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Carga! Carga!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Charge! Chaaaarge!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Resista! Podemos vencer se mantivermos firme!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Stand strong! We can win if we keep at it!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Se formos abaixo, vamos abaixo juntos!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: If we go down, we go down together!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Arrrgh... Grant...me....poder...!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Arrrgh... Grant...me....power...!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Vou rasgar seu traseiro demoníaco em dois!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: I'm gonna tear your demonic ass in half!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Todos os soldados, comecem a contra-ofensiva!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: All soldiers, commence counterattack!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: É como o renascimento de algum poder sombrio...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: It's like the rebirth of some dark power...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Onde está Lady Two?{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Where's Lady Two?{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Ultima vez que ouvi, ela estava indo para o santuário, com Cent!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Last I heard, she was headed for the shrine, with Cent!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Bom. Então devemos parar Zero aqui!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Good. Then we must stop Zero here!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Lady Two é nosso sol brilhante. Sem nosso sol, não somos nada!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Lady Two is our shining sun. Without our sun, we're nothing!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: O dragão é tão forte!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: The dragon's so strong!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Um Intoner que doma dragões? Não seja absurdo!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: A dragon-taming Intoner? Don't be absurd!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Nossa guarda traseira está enfraquecida!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Our rear guard is weakened!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: As baixas estão aumentando em todos os lugares!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Casualties are mounting everywhere!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Sem recuo, soldados! A pena para recuo é a morte!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: No retreat, soldiers! The penalty for retreat is death!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Quem ela pensa que é? QUEM DIABOS ELA PENSA QUE É??{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Who does she think she is? WHO THE HELL DOES SHE THINK SHE IS??{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Ei, cuidado com onde você balança aquilo! Você vai matar um de NÓS!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Hey, watch where you swing that thing! You're gonna kill one of US!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Resgate Mikhail.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Rescue Mikhail.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Derrote os soldados inimigos!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Derrote os inimigos que bloqueiam seu caminho!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Derrote os Lobos de Areia Alfa!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Alpha Sandwolves!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Derrote o Golem!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Golem!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Cara, estou com uma sede danada.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Man, I'm thirsty as hell.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Ho ho ho. Uma pena. Não estamos aptos{LF}a encontrar água neste lugar.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Ho ho ho. A shame. We're not apt{LF}to find water in this place.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Se tivermos que continuar lutando assim,{LF}vou desmaiar!{#Name="Dito"}
source: If we have to keep fighting like this,{LF}I'm gonna keel over!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: De fato, isso também me esgota.{LF}... Embora não meu poder masculino!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Indeed, it saps my strength as well.{LF}...Though not my man strength!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Puta merda, esses lobos são irritantes!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Goddamn, these wolves are annoying!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Os lobos podem sentir a intenção assassina{LF}dos seus inimigos...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Wolves can sense the murderous{LF}intent of their foes...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: O quê? Você está dizendo que eu não estou escondendo{LF}minha "intenção assassina" o suficiente!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What? You saying I'm not hiding{LF}my "murderous intent" enough!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: É só que devemos permanecer calmos, ou—{LF}Veja? Agora há mais deles!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: J-Just that we should remain calm, or—{LF}See? Now there's more of them!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: #Name="デカート"}
source: {#Name="デカート"}

translation: Tudo isso é culpa do dragão estúpido, não é?{#Name="Dito"}
source: This is all that stupid dragon's fault, isn't it?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Ele se deixa capturar, e então{LF}você fica louco de raiva...{#Name="Dito"}
source: He gets himself taken, and then{LF}you get all crazy with rage...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Não estou louco de raiva por causa dele...{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm not crazy with rage because of him...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Isso é apenas minha raiva normal, do dia a dia.{#Name="Zero"}
source: This is just my normal, everyday rage.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ah, realmente.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Oh, really.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Você não acredita em mim?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You don't believe me?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Não disse isso...{#Name="Dito"}
source: I didn't say that...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Você realmente quer morrer, não é?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You really do want to die, don't you?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Minha garganta está em chamas aqui.{#Name="Zero"}
source: My throat's on fire here.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh ho! Talvez um beijo doce{LF}possa apagar essas chamas!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho! Perhaps a sweet kiss{LF}can quench those flames!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: E então, posso limpar{LF}algum areia do covil do leão, mmm?{#Name="Octa"}
source: And then afterwards, I could clear{LF}some sand from the lion's den, mmm?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Mais uma palavra e eu vou cortá-lo.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Another word and I'll cut you down.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Esses bastardos! Atacando{LF}Lady Dois enquanto ela está doente!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Those bastards! Attacking{LF}Lady Two while she's ill!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Lutamos por Lady Dois, sussurro{LF}sereno da primavera!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: We fight for Lady Two, serene{LF}whisper of the spring!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Devemos aguentar até que ela se recupere!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: We must hold out until she recovers!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Ngh! Tão forte!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Ngh! So strong!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Não reclame! Você não pode servir a Lady Two dessa maneira!
source: No bellyaching! You can't{LF}serve Lady Two like that!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: A Lady Two está segura!?
source: Is Lady Two safe!?{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Não sei! Mas acho que ela está com Cent, pelo menos!
source: I don't know! But I think{LF}she's with Cent, at least!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Venha, você é amaldiçoado, flor negra!
source: 来やがれ、呪われし黒き花！{#Name="兵士"}

translation: Eu vou parar você!
source: 俺がオマエを止めてやる！{#Name="兵士"}

translation: Vamos pará-la aqui!
source: We'll stop her here!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: A Lady Two está doente... Vamos mostrar o que os seus artilheiros são capazes de fazer!
source: Lady Two is ill... Let's show her what her cannoneers are made of!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Sim, senhor! Bendita seja a Lady Two!
source: Yes, sir! Blessed be Lady Two!{#Name="Soldiers C/D/G"}

translation: Atire! Atire! Continue atirando!
source: Fire! Fire! Keep firing!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Eles estão lá! Não mire, apenas atire!
source: They're right there! Don't aim, just fire!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Sim, senhor!
source: Yes, sir!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Assim que você estiver carregado, atire à vontade!
source: Once you're loaded, fire at will!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Trancado e carregado!
source: Locked and loaded!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Ok. Atire!
source: よしッ。発砲！{#Name="兵士C"}

translation: Impacto confirmado!
source: Confirmed strike!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Menos confirmação, mais impacto!
source: Less confirming, more striking!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Estou farto desses brinquedos estúpidos...
source: I've had it with these stupid-ass little toys...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Venha em mim! Você E sua flor maldita!
source: Come at me! You AND your damn flower!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Vou derrubar vocês dois aqui mesmo!
source: I'll cut you both down right here!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Ajuda...ajuda-me...
source: Help...help me...{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: D-Droga... Minha perna...
source: D-Damn... My leg...{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Mais lobos!? Isso está ficando ridículo.{#Name="Zero"}
source: MORE wolves!? This is getting ri-goddamn-diculous.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Você disse. Estúpidos bolas de pelo...{#Name="Dito"}
source: You said it. Stupid furballs...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Nessa deserto, você está tendo um trabalho difícil{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: こんな砂漠でご苦労さまだな{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: É mesmo. Ninguém ganha nessa luta, é isso{#Name="ディト"}
source: まったくだよ。誰も得しない戦いだよ、コレ{#Name="ディト"}

translation: Nnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Nnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Você está bem, Decadus?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You all right, Decadus?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Areia... nos meus olhos... Tanta dor exquisita...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Sand...in my eyes... Such exquisite pain...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Sim, você está bem.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah, you're all right.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh ho! Estamos quase lá!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho! We're almost there!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: E apesar do calor, ainda estou pronto para mais...{#Name="Octa"}
source: And despite the heat, I'm still ready for more...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Maldição, por que diabos os lobos estão do lado DELA?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Dammit, why the hell are the wolves on HER side?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Não acho que esses sejam lobos selvagens comuns, minha senhora.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I don't think these are your everyday{LF}wild wolves, my lady.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Sim, Freakshow está certo. Esses caras são definitivamente treinados.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yeah, Freakshow's right. These guys{LF}are definitely trained.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Tanto faz. Se eles estiverem no meu caminho, eles vão ser derrubados!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Whatever. If they're in my way,{LF}they're getting cut down!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Um lugar agradável para uma soneca.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Nice place for a nap.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Não! Eles me pegaram! Eles me pegaram aqui, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: No! They caught me! They caught me here, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Posso ver isso.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I can see that.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zerooo! Me ajudeee!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zerooo! Help meee!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Sim, sim.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah, yeah.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Gólems...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Golems...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Então, como foi exatamente que você foi sequestrado novamente? Onde está seu cérebro?{#Name="Zero"}
source: So how is it exactly that you got{LF}kidnapped again? Where's your brain?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Na minha cabeça!{LF}... É na minha cabeça, certo?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: In my head!{LF}...It IS in my head, right?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Esqueça.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Forget it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Senhora Zero?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Lady Zero?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Hmm?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hmm?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Gólems são infundidos com feitiços mágicos{LF}que lhes dão vida.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Golems are infused with magic{LF}spells that give them life.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: E?{#Name="Zero"}
source: And?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: E disse feitiços mágicos são sempre{LF}gravados em seus corpos.{#Name="Octa"}
source: And said magic spells are always{LF}etched upon their bodies.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: E então?{#Name="Zero"}
source: So?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Er, bem, se você destruir a parte do corpo{LF}que contém o feitiço, talvez o gólem possa...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Er, well, if you destroy the part of the body{LF}that contains the spell, perhaps the golem may...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Muito trabalho. Vou apenas matá-lo até a morte.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Too much work. I'll just beat him to death.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Eu supus que seria sua resposta...{#Name="Octa"}
source: I assumed that would be your response...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Oh, querida...{#Name="Cent"}
source: Oh, dear...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: E eu aqui pensei que você seria esperto o suficiente para ficar longe.{#Name="Cent"}
source: And I here thought you'd be smart enough to stay away.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Bem, eu suponho que isso seja apenas a maldição de ser{LF}um cara de visão geral. Você sabe o que eu quero dizer?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Well, I suppose that's just the curse of being{LF}a big-picture kind of guy. Know what I mean?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Eu sei minhas próprias habilidades, e eu apenas espero que os outros as reconheçam também.{#Name="Cent"}
source: I know my own abilities, and I just expect others to recognize them as well.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Mas, acho que é pedir demais para pessoas como você, não é?
source: Buuut, I guess that's asking too much of folks like you, now, isn't it?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Quero dizer, por que esperar que as pessoas atinjam um ideal que não podem possivelmente alcançar? Estou certo?
source: I mean, why hold people to an ideal they can't possibly meet? Am I right?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Esse cara está começando a me irritar seriamente.
source: This guy's really startin' to piss me off.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Você é discípulo do Dois, é?
source: You're Two's disciple, yeah?{#Name="Zero"}
{06}>{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Devo matá-lo também?
source: Should I kill you, too?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Você vê?
source: You see?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Agora, passamos de ruim para pior.
source: Now we've gone from bad to worse.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: O quê?
source: What?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Vocês realmente são densos, sabem disso?
source: You people really are dense, you know that?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Acho que o universo simplesmente não pode ajudar aqueles que não se ajudam.
source: I guess the universe simply can't help those who won't help themselves.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: O que você está tentando—
source: What are you trying to—{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Zero.
source: Zero.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Um dia, esse dragão vai ser sua queda.
source: One of these days, that dragon is gonna be your downfall.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: E quando chegar aquele momento, será tarde demais para arrependimentos...traidor.
source: And when that moment comes, it will be too late for regrets...traitor.{#Name="Cent"}
{06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}
{06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Zero derrotou Três, mas perdeu Mikhail para o discípulo Cent no processo.
source: Zero defeated Three, but lost Mikhail to the disciple Cent in the process.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: O grupo foi para a casa de Cent na Terra de Areia para tentar resgatar o dragão…{#Name="Accord"}
source: The group headed for Cent's home in the Land of Sands to try and rescue the dragon…{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Sim, eu também sou apenas uma casca vazia, exceto pela paixão pelo sexo.{#Name="オクタ"}
source: 左様。私めも性への情熱以外はカラカラでございます{#Name="オクタ"}

translation: Olha, os lobos estão aumentando!{#Name="デカート"}
source: ほら、狼が増えてきた！{#Name="デカート"}

translation: Se você continuar falando besteira, eu vou matá-lo!{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: それ以上エロ口叩いたら殺すぞ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Você é um cara corrupto e podre!{#Name="兵士B"}
source: 性根の腐ったヤツらめ！{#Name="兵士B"}

translation: A... ajude-me...{#Name="兵士"}
source: た……助けて……{#Name="兵士"}

translation: Merda... meu pé...{#Name="兵士"}
source: くそっ……足が……{#Name="兵士"}

translation: Mais um lobo... que chato.{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: また狼か……ウンザリだな{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: É mesmo. Estou me sentindo enjoado.{#Name="ディト"}
source: まったくだよ。吐き気がする{#Name="ディト"}
